      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context)
      Construct a new Switch with default styling.
      MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context, android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
      Construct a new Switch with default styling, overriding specific style attributes as requested.
      MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context, android.util.AttributeSet attrs, int defStyleAttr)
      Construct a new Switch with a default style determined by the given theme attribute, overriding specific style attributes as requested.

      • MkSwQiSwitch

        public MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context)
        Construct a new Switch with default styling.
        参数:
        context - The Context that will determine this widget's theming.

      • MkSwQiSwitch

        public MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context,
                    android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Construct a new Switch with default styling, overriding specific style attributes as requested.
        参数:
        context - The Context that will determine this widget's theming.
        attrs - Specification of attributes that should deviate from default styling.

      • MkSwQiSwitch

        public MkSwQiSwitch(android.content.Context context,
                    android.util.AttributeSet attrs,
                    int defStyleAttr)
        Construct a new Switch with a default style determined by the given theme attribute, overriding specific style attributes as requested.
        参数:
        context - The Context that will determine this widget's theming.
        attrs - Specification of attributes that should deviate from the default styling.
        defStyleAttr - An attribute in the current theme that contains a reference to a style resource that supplies default values for

    • 方法详细资料

      • callOnClick

        public boolean callOnClick()
        Directly call any attached OnClickListener. Unlike CompoundButton.performClick(), this only calls the listener, and does not do any associated clicking actions like reporting an accessibility event. Automatically set check state after calling this method
        覆盖:
        callOnClick 在类中 android.view.View
        返回:
        True there was an assigned OnClickListener that was called, false otherwise is returned.
